bug.author: tomoaki0705
bug.summary: dnn module fails build on Visual Studio 2012
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => master ( 10e6491 ) Operating System / Platform => Windows 7 64bit Compiler => Visual Studio 2012 Pro Update 5
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
DNN module fails by following error which happens here
<denchmark-code>modules\dnn\src\torch\THDiskFile.cpp(330): error C2065: 'int32_t' : undeclared identifier </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Checkout master ( 10e6491 ) Configure and make as usual I'll write a PR for this later
